armorstatushud.config.title: Armor Status HUD config
armorstatushud.config.general.enabled.de: Enables or disables the Armor Status HUD display.
Sets the position of the HUD on the screen.
armorstatushud.config.general.listMode.d: Sets the direction to display status items.
armorstatushud.config.general.enableItem: Set to true to show item names.
armorstatushud.config.general.showDamage: Set to true to show the standard inventory item overlay (damage bar).
armorstatushud.config.general.showItemCo: Set to true to show the item count overlay.
armorstatushud.config.general.damageColo: This is a list of percent damage thresholds and text color codes that will be used when item damage is <= the threshold. Format used: "," separates the threshold and the color code, ";" separates each pair. Valid color values are 0-9, a-f.
armorstatushud.config.general.damageDisp: Valid damageDisplayType strings are value, percent, or none.
armorstatushud.config.general.damageThre: The type of threshold to use when applying the damageColorList thresholds.
armorstatushud.config.general.showItemDa: Set to true to show held item damage values.
armorstatushud.config.general.showArmorD: Set to true to show armor damage values.
armorstatushud.config.general.showMaxDam: Set to true to show the max damage when damageDisplayType=value.
armorstatushud.config.general.showEquipp: Set to true to show info for your currently equipped item.
armorstatushud.config.general.showOffHan: Set to true to show info for your currently offhand equipped item.
armorstatushud.config.general.xOffset.de: Horizontal offset from the edge of the screen (when using right alignments the x offset is relative to the right edge of the screen).
armorstatushud.config.general.yOffset.de: Vertical offset from the edge of the screen (when using bottom alignments the y offset is relative to the bottom edge of the screen).
armorstatushud.config.general.yOffsetBot: Vertical offset used only for the bottomcenter alignment to avoid the vanilla HUD.
armorstatushud.config.general.applyXOffs: Set to true if you want the xOffset value to be applied when using a center alignment.
armorstatushud.config.general.applyYOffs: Set to true if you want the yOffset value to be applied when using a middle alignment.
armorstatushud.config.general.showInChat: Set to true to show info when chat is open, false to disable info when chat is open.
